  <description>
    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=166&file=166_slipin-levittaminen.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=166&file=166_slipin-levittaminen.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Slipin levittäminen</string>
            <string language="en">Spreading ’slip’</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgebreitetes?slip?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">?slip de propagation ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">?slip espalhando?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">?slip di diffusione?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση ?slip;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿?slip que se separa?</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten savea voidaan muotoilla rikkomalla yhdistettäviä pintoja ja levittämällä rikotulle pinnalle slippi.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how clay can be shaped by breaking combining surfaces and spreading slip (liquid clay) onto the broken surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slip</string>
            <string language="en">liquid</string>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">levytekniikka</string>
            <string language="fi">käsinrakennusmenetelmät,</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie Lehm geformt werden kann, indem 
man kombinierende Oberflächen bricht und Beleg (flüssigen Lehm) auf 
die unterbrochene Oberfläche verbreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment de l'argile peut être formé en
cassant les surfaces de combinaison et en écartant la glissade 
(argile liquide) sur la surface cassée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como a argila pode ser dada forma 
quebrando superfícies combinando e espalhando o deslizamento (argila 
líquida) na superfície quebrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come l'argilla può essere 
modellata rompendo le superfici di combinazione e spargendo lo 
slittamento (argilla liquida) sulla superficie rotta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς ο άργιλος μπορεί να 
διαμορφωθεί με το σπάσιμο των συνδυάζοντας επιφανειών και τη 
διάδοση της ολίσθησης (υγρός άργιλος) επάνω στη σπασμένη 
επιφάνεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo la arcilla puede ser formada 
rompiendo superficies que combinan y separando el resbalón (arcilla 
líquida) sobre la superficie quebrada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glissade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liquide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">argile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslizamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">líquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">argila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">superfície</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arcilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">superficie</string>
          </keyword>
